item.description:
About This Game

Hellcard is a cooperative roguelike deckbuilder that can be played in both Singleplayer and Multiplayer modes. The game takes place in the paper dungeons known from Book of Demons, and its main mechanics revolve around deckbuilding and fast-paced tactical card battles.

If you are excited about HELLCARD, be sure to wishlist the game on Steam. Otherwise, consider wishlisting anyway - who knows, we might surprise you yet!



What makes HELLCARD unique and different from other deck-building games is that monster placement actually matters and can be used to your advantage.



HELLCARD supports co-op battles with up to three heroes facing the Archdemon's hordes. In singleplayer mode, you can descend into the dungeons solo or recruit computer-controlled companions. In multiplayer mode, your friends or strangers can help you battle the hordes of hell.






Return 2 Games is a series of unique mid-core games inspired by the golden days of PC gaming. Each R2G title is a tribute to a single hit game from the '90s: a reimagining of a single universal story for a brand-new audience, using modern means and innovative, often vastly simplified gameplay mechanics.



HELLCARD was first envisioned as a new game mode inside the Book of Demons universe, but we soon realized that its design is huge and that it should be executed as a stand-alone spin-off game. item.title: Granblue Fantasy: Relink
item.description:
About This Game

Story
Granblue Fantasy takes place in the Sky Realm, a world where myriad islands float in a great blue expanse. Take your role as captain of a skyfaring crew, joined by a scrappy little dragon named Vyrn and a young girl with mysterious powers named Lyria. Together you sail with a colorful cast of crewmates, including kings and misfits alike, for Estalucia, a fabled island beyond the end of the skies.

In the Zegagrande Skydom, islands are guarded by powerful creatures known as primal beasts and winds carry tales of a secretive organization known as the Church of Avia. Unveil a web of intrigue reaching far beyond the borders of Zegagrande and engage in a battle for the fate of the Sky Realm itself.

Gameplay
Engage in real-time combat with a party of four in this character action RPG‚Äîchoose from a diverse roster of skyfarers, each with their own unique weapons, skills, and combat styles. Teamwork makes the dream work with party-based mechanics such as Link Attacks and Chain Bursts to help you crush foes in spectacular fashion. Tackle quests solo or with the help of others for up to 4-player co-op and take down treacherous foes to score rare loot to further enhance your gear. Every enemy and party formation has its own strengths and weaknesses‚Äîthe key to victory lies in working out how these pieces fit together.

Fast-paced combat not your thing? Assist modes can provide accessibility for gamers of all skill levels. Toggle on Full Assist to have all actions performed automatically during battle!

The Sky Realm is rich in lore and history. Browse Lyria's journal at any point during the game to access a trove of writings on the world's peoples, places, and more. In addition to the wealth of side quests available, Fate Episodes allow you to delve into the backstories of each member of your crew!

item.title: Summon Masters
item.description:
About This Game

This is a card and board game with the following features:

Deck Building: Players can build their own decks to battle with. Depending on different strategies and opponents, players can choose different cards to counter.

Tactical Gameplay: The game uses a 3x10 chessboard, and players can freely place cards to fight. Players need to develop tactics and arrange card positions and usage order within limited space.

Different Professions: Players can choose freely from four professions - swordsman, mage, monk, and archer. Each profession has different characteristics and skills, and players can choose according to their preferences and tactical needs.

Competitive Battles: Players can battle with other players after building their decks, and it is fun to fight with other people. Through battles with other players, players can improve their strength and tactical skills.

Team Dungeons: In addition to fighting against other players, players can also team up with others to challenge high-difficulty dungeons. Players need to defeat powerful bosses through cooperation and strategy to get more rewards and cards.

Special Challenges: Players can participate in special rules challenges and use their intelligence to defeat other players. These special rules make the game more interesting and challenging, and players need to constantly think and try new strategies.

Fast-paced: Each game is fast-paced (within 5 minutes), and can be played in short fragments of time. The fast pace of the game allows players to enjoy the game in a short time, while also being able to play at any time and anywhere.

item.title: The Carrier and Crows

item.title: Ekikoi: The Young Miss Falls for the Station Attendant - VAM
item.description:

item.title: They Can Hear Us

item.title: Dynamic Shooting VR

item.title: L'√éle Arch√©o
item.description:
About This Game

item.title: Adapta Solva
item.description:
About This Game

Absorb elements from magical shrines to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles in this cute and short little adventure where you follow a magical creature in a world laid to ruin by an unknown cause.

On your adventure you can collect any of the following three elements from different elemental shrines and use their unique properties and abilities to solve the puzzles and unlock the next areas.
  • Stone is the heaviest and the strongest of the elements, use your ground slam or punch ability to break certain walls and floors or to punch heavy boulders around
  • Slime is a sticky but bouncy element, use it to jump higher, pass through grates and climb up sticky walls. You can also leave behind a gooey slimeball that will disappear after a short time. You also have to be careful though, since slime isn't fully solid it will dissolve into water!
  • Crystal is the final collectable element and it's surprisingly slippery, use it to crystalize bodies of water so you can walk across and be able to push boulders and slimeballs on top of it.

Uncover the mysteries as you follow a magical creature capable of absorbing elements from magical shrines, as they uncover more and more about how they were created and why the world has fallen into ruin. Explore your surroundings to find ancient artifacts and items from the locals as well as murals drawn by the ancient civilization that depict the story of world.

This game was made by 6 students as a group project assignment for their third year at Digital Arts & Entertainment at Hogeschool West-Vlaanderen in Belgium. We want to give a special thanks to our supervisors, Dave Van Verdegem and Tristan Clarysse who helped us through the 11 week process of making the game.

item.title: Cow Life Sim RPG
item.description:
About This Game

Become a cow in this sandbox RPG experience!


You've set off on a voyage to Snoutsville and the world is before you! Explore the area, embark on quests, or make your own adventures! Level up unique and innovative skills and experiment to find the best training methods. Collect and create cool items! You can do anything when you are a cow!

Features

item.title: Brothers in Blood: WW2
item.description:

item.title: I Wani Hug that Gator!
item.description:
About This Game

Wait, what do you mean we‚Äôre moving?!

Just great; just when Inco was getting ready to move on into his Senior year, his parents decide to uproot his life and move half-way across the country!

Wait, am I being graded on this?!

But be warned: The choices you make expands the relationships with Inco‚Äôs classmates and determines which of the four unique endings you receive. item.title: Folgore
item.description:
About This Game

what Is Folgore

Folgore is a top view fighting game, inspired by comics, taking place in south Italy at the end of the 60‚Äôs.

To save his fianc√©e and his honor, the hero must cross the city of Olimpia, inspired by Naples, and eliminate all types of enemies on his way to the final boss. To do that, he makes a pact with the Folgore, a divine artifact endowed with electrical powers from Jupiter, but renowned to be dangerous for its owner .

With the Folgore, the player can attack by combining melee attacks and electrical powers. He can also interact with his environment to stun his enemies and continue the level.
During some scenarized moments, an ultimate power called the overload activates to remind the instability of the Folgore and make the player experience even more pleasurable.


The goal in Folgore is to let off steam while playing an original game full of dark humor. The player needs to feel the strength of his powers, but also the shift of the ‚Äúhero‚Äù to the dark side.

To treat this subject correctly, we took a lot of inspiration from dark comics like Batman, we decided to combine 2D and 3D to accentuate this.
To understand the genesis of Folgore, look at a comic book. But instead of reading it, you are going to play it.


In Folgore, we wanted a strong identity : the temporality of the game is unique, blending the Italian 50‚Äôs and Roman mythology, which allowed us a lot of liberty, especially for the creation of enemies. The dark comics aesthetic and humor of the game remind the player of the anti-hero personality of the playable character, but also the grim after-war period in Italy. For the gameplay, we came back to the basics : not a lot of inputs and a gameplay easy to learn that needs to be mastered to be effective. The originality resides in the electrical powers that Giove got from the Folgore : It allows him to interact with his environment and perform faster and more powerful attacks and movements, while getting the player to manage his power gauge to survive the enemies' waves. Finally, even if it's better to play the game with a controller, we chose to adapt the game for arcades to remember the feeling of an old school beat them all.

item.title: Iragon
item.description:
About This Game

About the Game


We think the best way for us to explain this game is to tell you how we came up with this idea. Everybody who works at Repulse loves fantasy anime. We are huge fans of shows like Attack on Titan and Full Metal Alchemist. And we also like to play visual novels, especially the ones with erotic and lesbian content.

When we finished our last game, we asked ourselves: What if we could combine the elements we love most about anime and visual novels in an interactive VR experience that you could also play without VR. And that is exactly what Iragon is about.

You play the game as Darick, a poor kid from a small village. Everything for him changes when he meets a bisexual girl who gets ambushed by soldiers of the Empire. To help her, you must learn to use your magic, but on your quest to bring her home safe, you will have to journey into a dangerous frozen world. Along the way, you will battle enemy soldiers, undead skeletons, and perhaps cross paths with seductive creatures of the frozen land while you unlock new erotic adventures with her.

So this is ultimately a game about living out a high fantasy adventure, with a strong emphasis on putting the player in control. The game is meant to be experienced in VR, but we dedicated an equal amount of care to deliver a standard version that will work for players who do not have a VR headset.

Features

Whether you play in VR or not, you can expect us to deliver:


  • 3 Main storyline romance routes
  • 4 Side romance routes
  • 12 Monster girls you can romance
  • Interactive experiences with your love interests
  • Different outfits
  • Voice acting
  • Motion captured animations
  • A dynamic combat system that features both magic and melee;
  • Destructible environments;
  • A dialogue choice system that influences the response you get.

STORY

Be the hero, live the story, and go on an adventure of a lifetime while you immerse yourself fully in the world of Iragon, with a complete animated story and full voice acted cast. (skip options are also available for those who prefer to just get on with the action.)

GAMEPLAY

item.title: A Void Shaper

Shape the void with the power of your cursor! A Void Shaper is an arcade game about avoiding shapes and killing them, while you collect upgrades. Unlock new enemy shapes and upgrades as you progress through the game and complete your collection.


Your only task is to avoid the shapes and survive as long as possible. And all you have to do is to move your cursor.

Each enemy shape has different variations called "Champion" and "Giant", these have adjusted stats and can possibly even drop special upgrades.   • Attack Speed Increase (ASPD+)
  • Magnetism
  • Homing
  • Projectile Count Increase
I'm sure that you will find upgrades that you like!

Dive into an immersive and revitalizing experience with HealQuest, a revolutionary VR game that redefines the concept of playful physical activity. Transport yourself to a breathtaking tropical island, where idyllic landscapes invite adventure and well-being.

At the heart of HealQuest lies an innovative goal: to get moving in order to explore and interact with the environment. As you stroll through the island's winding trails, discover entry points that trigger dynamic and entertaining sports exercises. Whether performing jumps, stretches or cardio exercises, each activity is seamlessly integrated into the exploration of this paradise world.

One of the most captivating aspects of HealQuest lies in its interaction with the island's inhabitants: colorful, cheerful characters who invite you to play and progress. Forge bonds with local animals, overcome creature-specific challenges and improve your skills as you discover the island's secrets.

Thanks to visually stunning environments, total immersion in virtual reality and a variety of playfully integrated sports activities, HealQuest offers a unique gaming experience. Stimulating body and mind, this game invites players to escape on an enchanting adventure where fun, exploration and fitness meet.

Developed by the studio Voskalia, HealQuest is much more than a simple VR video game; it's an invitation to discover the pleasure of physical exercise and exploration in a heavenly setting, offering a revolutionary and refreshing gaming experience.

item.title: Pulsar, The VR Experience
item.description:
About This Game



PULSAR is an award-winning 40-minute Immersive Art Installation with occasional interaction: a tribute to the imaginative spirit of six-year-old Eloise who lost her battle with leukemia.

Three portals into deep space. Three unique, music-driven journeys.

PULSAR invites you to enter an artistic representation of Eloise‚Äôs final birthday wish. You are now a Galactic Observer and a Virtual Astronaut. You can transcend the fragility and physical restrictions of human existence and experience another dimension. Witness galactic events, the birth and demise of stars and planetary systems. Soak up the sights and sounds. Enjoy the slow discovery. Hear the captivating melodies of the Universe. Harness the energy in the pit of a Black Hole. Affect the flow of linear time. Venture on an unusual spacewalk. Demolish fierce asteroids to protect a planet from destruction. Co-create solar systems based on the rhythms, textures, and colors of universal frequencies. Extras offer you a 3D volume of scientific facts and animations.

PULSAR promises you delight, awe, wonder, and the freedom to create your own interpretation.

(Note: Headphones are recommended to experience the full audio immersion of Pulsar, The VR Experience)

item.title: MimiCries
item.description:
About This Game

MimiCries is a Victorian-inspired, narrative-driven puzzle room game where players investigate the devastated remnants of the tragic Griswald family, and escape from
the horrors of their accursed residence.

Key Features

Immersive Pixel-art



Drawing creatively from the Victorian period, all pixel-art in MimiCries has been meticulously curated to craft time-accurate environments, with astonishing designs that may literally take your breath away.

Interactive Puzzle-solving



Emulating your playable character's point-of-view, MimiCries offers a plethora of object
and character interactions, which evolve as you make progress with its variety of unique
and challenging puzzles.

Duality Of Light



As you traverse the dark rooms and corridors of the Griswald mansion in MimiCries,
the light sources you have on hand will both help and hinder your exploration. In the
engulfing darkness, will light be the key for your freedom?

All mysteries lay in wait for your unravelling. The Griswald mansion beckons...

item.description:

item.title: Devilish League
item.description:
About This Game

Swing, hit, and bounce! Blast enemies with your heavy bat in this hilarious cartoon roguelike!


About the game
Devilish League is a cartoon roguelike with heavy bat-swinging action!
You play as the badass Bash and face off against the evil Durahan's team!
Enjoy cool battles, tons of items to collect, and an addictive adventure as you blast away enemies!

item.title: Undulations
item.description:
About This Game

This is a survival escape action game from a huge wave that will make you feel fear and despair within the first minute.

The setting is an exoplanet where waves of over 3,000 feet (about 900 meters) are constantly hitting the surface of the planet, due to the gravity of a giant red dwarf star and its orbital period of about 60 minutes.
The objective of the player is to escape from the waves and survive.

This game is an escape game, but there are no complicated puzzle elements; all you need is the courage and strength to overcome fear.

Overcoming this fear, thinking and acting in order to survive, continuing to challenge without giving up, and the scenery you see after surviving will surely leave a strong impression on the minds of those who play the game.

item.title: Crush Link TD
item.description:
About This Game



Don't waste your chance!

Your task is to protect your base preventing spam from getting into your inbox. Build towers in marked places to stop spam.

Crush Link TD is an unusual Tower Defense strategy game where you will meet unexpected mobs, defeat various bosses, upgrade virtual towers, earn in-game achievements and arrange a date with your crush.

item.title: A Nutritious Boyfriend
item.description:
About This Game

Amazing!

You have just started a new position as the first female human professional trainer at the prestigious Squirrel Fitness Club, a club for dedicated squirrels. Motivate and coach squirrel members until you stumble upon love with fun obstacles along the way. Finding your nutritious life partner won't be a crawl in the park but where there is hope, there is love! Enjoy this adventurous and adorable squirrel dating sim respectfully and heavily inspired by the avian dating sim Hatoful Boyfriend.

This rodent visual novel/dating sim includes 8 dateable squirrels all with unique traits and personalities, training your favorite squirrel may help him win his big race at the end of the game, and making the right choices may leave you with a big diamond acorn on your finger, but over-training any of the squirrels or making the wrong choices can lead to some pretty nutty consequences.
